languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестра Сороритас{/g} мрачно кивает на Идиру.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Псайкера{/g} охватил недуг... или темное безумие. Она рвалась увидеть Вольного Торговца. Я решила, что неразумно... оставлять ее без присмотра".

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестра Сороритас{/g} мрачно кивает на Идиру.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Псайкера{/g} охватил недуг... или темное безумие. Она рвалась увидеть Вольного Торговца. Я решила, что неразумно... оставлять ее без присмотра".

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} grimly nods toward Idira.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is suffering some ailment... or dark madness. She insisted on seeing the Rogue Trader. I judged that it would be unwise... to leave her unsupervised."
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Сестра Сороритас{/g} мрачно кивает на Идиру.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Псайкера{/g} охватил недуг... или темное безумие. Она рвалась увидеть Вольного Торговца. Я решила, что неразумно... оставлять ее без присмотра".

traits.locale_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} grimly nods toward Idira.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is suffering some ailment... or dark madness. She insisted on seeing the Rogue Trader. I judged that it would be unwise... to leave her unsupervised."

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} grimly nods toward Idira.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is suffering some ailment... or dark madness. She insisted on seeing the Rogue Trader. I judged that it would be unwise... to leave her unsupervised."

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} grimly nods toward Idira.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is suffering some ailment... or dark madness. She insisted on seeing the Rogue Trader. I judged that it would be unwise... to leave her unsupervised."

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} grimly nods toward Idira.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is suffering some ailment... or dark madness. She insisted on seeing the Rogue Trader. I judged that it would be unwise... to leave her unsupervised."

languages.text: {n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}战斗修女{/g}阴沉着脸，朝伊迪拉点了点头。{/n}“那个{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}正在遭受某种病痛的折磨……或是遭到黑暗的疯狂所侵蚀。她坚持要见行商浪人一面，而我判断这种行为是不明智的……除非有人监督她。”
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} grimly nods toward Idira.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is suffering some ailment... or dark madness. She insisted on seeing the Rogue Trader. I judged that it would be unwise... to leave her unsupervised."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}战斗修女{/g}阴沉着脸，朝伊迪拉点了点头。{/n}“那个{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}正在遭受某种病痛的折磨……或是遭到黑暗的疯狂所侵蚀。她坚持要见行商浪人一面，而我判断这种行为是不明智的……除非有人监督她。”

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}シスター・オヴ・バトル{/g}はイディラに向かって不機嫌そうにうなずく。{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}は何らかの病気か…あるいは暗黒の狂気に苦しんでいる。彼女はローグトレーダーに会いたがっていた。私は、この女を監視なしに放置するのは…賢明ではないと判断したんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} grimly nods toward Idira.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is suffering some ailment... or dark madness. She insisted on seeing the Rogue Trader. I judged that it would be unwise... to leave her unsupervised."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}シスター・オヴ・バトル{/g}はイディラに向かって不機嫌そうにうなずく。{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}は何らかの病気か…あるいは暗黒の狂気に苦しんでいる。彼女はローグトレーダーに会いたがっていた。私は、この女を監視なしに放置するのは…賢明ではないと判断したんだ」

languages.text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwester der Schlacht{/g} nickt grimmig in Richtung Idira.{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikerin{/g} leidet an irgendeiner Krankheit ... oder finsterem Wahnsinn. Sie hat darauf bestanden, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu sehen. Ich hielt es für unklug ... sie ohne Aufsicht zu lassen."
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} grimly nods toward Idira.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is suffering some ailment... or dark madness. She insisted on seeing the Rogue Trader. I judged that it would be unwise... to leave her unsupervised."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Schwester der Schlacht{/g} nickt grimmig in Richtung Idira.{/n} "Die {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikerin{/g} leidet an irgendeiner Krankheit ... oder finsterem Wahnsinn. Sie hat darauf bestanden, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu sehen. Ich hielt es für unklug ... sie ohne Aufsicht zu lassen."

languages.text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sœur de Bataille{/g} fait un signe de tête en direction d'Idira.{/n} « La {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} est souffrante... ou atteinte de démence. Elle a insisté pour voir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. J'ai pensé qu'il serait imprudent... de la laisser sans surveillance. »
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} grimly nods toward Idira.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is suffering some ailment... or dark madness. She insisted on seeing the Rogue Trader. I judged that it would be unwise... to leave her unsupervised."

traits.locale_text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sœur de Bataille{/g} fait un signe de tête en direction d'Idira.{/n} « La {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} est souffrante... ou atteinte de démence. Elle a insisté pour voir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. J'ai pensé qu'il serait imprudent... de la laisser sans surveillance. »

languages.text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Hermana de Batalla{/g} asiente con seriedad a Idira.{/n} «La {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquica{/g} sufre de alguna enfermedad... de una siniestra locura. Ha insistido en ver a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Consideré que no sería sensato... dejarla sin supervisión».
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} grimly nods toward Idira.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is suffering some ailment... or dark madness. She insisted on seeing the Rogue Trader. I judged that it would be unwise... to leave her unsupervised."

traits.locale_text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Hermana de Batalla{/g} asiente con seriedad a Idira.{/n} «La {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquica{/g} sufre de alguna enfermedad... de una siniestra locura. Ha insistido en ver a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Consideré que no sería sensato... dejarla sin supervisión».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Harp Rahibesi{/g}, başıyla sertçe İdira'yı işaret ediyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Ruhsezer{/g} bir hastalık ya da... Karanlık bir delilikten muzdarip. Hür Tacir'i görmekte ısrar etti. Kendisini başıboş bırakmanın akıllıca olmayacağına kanaat getirdim."
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Sister of Battle{/g} grimly nods toward Idira.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is suffering some ailment... or dark madness. She insisted on seeing the Rogue Trader. I judged that it would be unwise... to leave her unsupervised."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Harp Rahibesi{/g}, başıyla sertçe İdira'yı işaret ediyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Ruhsezer{/g} bir hastalık ya da... Karanlık bir delilikten muzdarip. Hür Tacir'i görmekte ısrar etti. Kendisini başıboş bırakmanın akıllıca olmayacağına kanaat getirdim."
